exceptions.tactic: specialize (orig_base_params0 one_node_params0 raft_params0 P net net' gd d h d').
exceptions.exn: The reference orig_base_params0 was not found in the current environment.

In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface llli : logs_leaderLogs_interface lltsi : leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface llcei : leaderLogs_candidate_entries_interface ollpti : one_leaderLog_per_term_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface net, net' : network gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output h : Net.name d' : raft_data H : reboot d = d' H0 : forall (h : Net.name) (ll : list entry) (t' : term) (h' : Net.name) (ll' : list entry) (e e' : entry), In (eTerm e, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t', ll') (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h'))) -> In e ll' -> In e' ll -> In e' ll' H1 : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net H2 : nwState net h = (gd, d) H3 : forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h' H4 : nwPackets net = nwPackets net' h0 : Net.name ll : list entry t' : term h' : Net.name ll' : list entry e, e' : entry H5 : In (eTerm e, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net' h0))) H6 : In (t', ll') (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net' h'))) H7 : In e ll' H8 : In e' ll Unable to unify "nwState net h = (gd, d)" with "In e' ll'".

original: intros. unfold refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot, leaderLogs_preserved in *. intros. specialize (orig_base_params0 one_node_params0 raft_params0 P net net' gd d h d'). intros. apply H2; auto.
